name: vscode-node-debug-process-picker
description: Provides configurable pick-process command while debugging Node.js program in vscode.

commands.title: Pick Filtered Process: Pick a process to debug

nodeDebugProcessPicker.filter.description:
Glob pattern to filter available node process when used in vscode 'launch.json' configuration while debugging. For example: 

  "processId": "${command:PickFilteredProcess}"

nodeDebugProcessPicker.autoAttach.description: If the picker found only one matched process, attach it immediately, without manual pick-confirm
